text: Ojo musrikon ma'ʙudone, dorand, ki ʙe ruxsati Alloh dine ʙarojason muqarrar dostaand?! Va agar kalimai fasl (ja'ne, qazo va qadari ilohi ʙa der partoftani azoʙason dar dunjo) nameʙud, haroina, mijonason azoʙ ʙa tavri ocil dar hamin dunjo ʙar pesvojoni sirk hukm mesud va alʙatta, ruzi qijomat ʙaroi sitamkoron azoʙi dardovarest
